name: Rajesh Nair
tagline: Software Craftsman → Lead SDE → Principal → (aspiring) Architect | Distributed Systems, Observability, Java
about: A software craftsman with a vision to develop good quality software. I have an artistic approach to make work special when it comes to delivering good quality and on time products. I believe in good design for the craft which makes development easier. Observation and analysis are core to my work. Experience across backend (J2EE, C/C++) and frontend (AngularJS, JavaScript), on Windows and Linux. Hands-on with deployments and troubleshooting on tough platforms. From design to development and leading people, challenges have been a catalyst for me to grow. I aim to keep growing with great teams and elevate my thinking to the next level.

highlights: Leading development teams across services and components.
Driving distributed computing initiatives and platform improvements.
Establishing observability and monitoring best practices (metrics, logs, traces).
Architecture and delivery leadership for core products.
Mentored engineers and improved engineering practices.
Partnered with stakeholders to align roadmap with customer needs.
Developed and deployed product features end-to-end.
Resolved deployment issues and streamlined release processes.
Developed, deployed, and maintained existing software systems.
Developed, deployed, and maintained software solutions.
Client communication and support with minimal supervision.

projects.name: Enterprise Integrations & Observability Enablement
projects.description: Introduced distributed tracing, metrics, and logging foundations across services to improve reliability and debuggability.

projects.name: Product Delivery & Deployment Streamlining
projects.description: Automated and standardized deployment workflows, reducing time-to-release and failures in difficult platform environments.

education.title: Bachelor of Engineering (B.E.), Computer Engineering
education.notes: Committee member of Tesla (National Level event). Presented paper on 3D visualization of web search. Tree plantation & blood donation camps. Project on Sendmail MTA.

education.title: H.S.C, Science
education.notes: Tree plantation, IUCCA visit, blood donation. Strong in Mathematics and Physics.
